## Description {#details}

Adaptor that maps from a SCC to its functions.

Designed to allow composition of a FunctionPass(Manager) and a <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4ded4558d2b58dcdd7a1736aa69a8bc4">CGSCCPassManager</a>. Note that if this pass is constructed with a pointer to a <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a571b2bbf074b46c75300bd8f14c5ab72">CGSCCAnalysisManager</a></code> it will run the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionanalysismanagercgsccproxy">FunctionAnalysisManagerCGSCCProxy</a></code> analysis prior to running the function pass over the SCC to enable a <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adce09a5a0de0e3177eb00e932734af2f">FunctionAnalysisManager</a></code> to be used within this run safely.

Definition at line 443 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/cgsccpassmanager-h">CGSCCPassManager.h</a>.
